title: Bowl, ca. 1800–20
provenance: Delomosne and Son, LTD, London, (07-29-66) purchased by WPW
dimensions: H x diam.: 23 x 21 cm (9 1/16 x 8 1/4 in.)
description: Circular bowl with wide turned over rim on tall knopped stem with flat, circular foot. Body has movided panels of diamond and fluted pattern. Underside of rim also with movided ring pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1800–20.
ca. 1800–20. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-193.
